host.label: Listen Address
host.description: Select the IP address for MCP service binding.
host.localhostDesc: Accessible only from this machine, more secure
host.lanDesc: Accessible from LAN devices (ensure trusted network, avoid public Wi-Fi)

portMode.label: Port Mode
portMode.descriptionRandom: Automatically select an available port at startup (check the exposure panel for the actual port after startup).
portMode.descriptionManual: Manually specify the service listening port.

webOnly.title: APP Only
webOnly.description: Cannot start MCP server in web environment. Please use this feature in the Electron app.

client.label: Client
client.description: Select the client type for MCP integration.

versionHint.title: Version Control Notice
versionHint.description: Version control features remain active during external MCP calls

errors.envNotSupported: MCP server not supported in this environment (Electron only)
